abstract: Crews at Red Bull Arena worked throughout the day to keep the field and stadium relatively clear of snow ahead of Sunday afternoon's playoff game.
snippet: Crews at Red Bull Arena worked throughout the day to keep the field and stadium relatively clear of snow ahead of Sunday afternoon's playoff game.
lead_paragraph: First, it was Tropical Storm Irene that forced the postponement on Aug. 28 of the Red Bulls' game against the Los Angeles Galaxy.
